# Клас Swoole\\Exception

(PECL swoole >= 1.9.0)

## Вступ

## Огляд класів

```classsynopsis



    
     
      class Swoole\Exception
     

     
      extends
       Exception
     

     implements 
       Throwable {

    /* Наследуемые свойства */
    
      protected
      string
       $message = "";
private
      string
       $string = "";
protected
      int
       $code;
protected
      string
       $file = "";
protected
      int
       $line;
private
      array
       $trace = [];
private
      ?Throwable
       $previous = null;


   }
```
